Html:
I now want to create a Microsoft.Win32.TaskScheduler.task in the memory, but not in OS.

I read the interface and source cod, and found that the only way to get task is create a task in OS.
I want to create a task without any effect in Windows, is it possible?
This library works only with the OS. An application can create a task however that has a defined termination and deletion time or can be programmatically deleted when an application shuts down.
